title: New country - new people
brief_description: Describes the original settlement of New Zealand by Europeans, and the various cultures and skills these settlers brought with them. Looks at the lives of present day descendants of these Europeans, and also the more recent migrants to the country.
description: Describes the original settlement of New Zealand by Europeans, and the various cultures and skills these settlers brought with them. Looks at the lives of present day descendants of these Europeans, and also the more recent migrants to the country.
